# Playlist.Entry.Item

**Enumeration**

An item that corresponds to an entry in a playlist.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Item
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **Playlist.Entry.Item.musicVideo(_:)**: An item that corresponds to a music video.
- **Playlist.Entry.Item.song(_:)**: An item that corresponds to a song.

## Instance Properties

- **albumTitle**: The title of the album the playlist entry’s item appears on.
- **artistName**: The artist’s name.
- **artistURL**: The artist’s URL.
- **artwork**: The artwork for the playlist entry’s item.
- **contentRating**: The rating of the content.
- **duration**: The duration of the playlist entry’s item.
- **editorialNotes**: The editorial notes for the playlist entry’s item.
- **genreNames**: The names of the playlist entry’s item associated genres.
- **id**: The unique identifier for the playlist entry item.
- **isrc**: The International Standard Recording Code (ISRC) for the playlist entry’s item.
- **lastPlayedDate**: The date when the user last played the playlist entry’s item on this device.
- **libraryAddedDate**: The date when the user added the playlist entry’s item to the library.
- **playCount**: The number of times the user played the playlist entry’s item.
- **playParameters**: The parameters to use to play the playlist entry’s item.
- **previewAssets**: The preview assets for the playlist entry’s item.
- **releaseDate**: The release date of the playlist entry’s item.
- **title**: The title of the playlist entry’s item.
- **url**: The URL for the playlist entry’s item.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Identifiable
- MusicItem
- MusicPropertyContainer
- PlayableMusicItem
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
